resize.title: Resize Image
resize.resizeByPixelsDescription: Resize by specifying dimensions in pixels.
resize.resizeByPercentageDescription: Resize by specifying a percentage of the original size.
resize.maintainAspectRatioDescription: Maintain the original aspect ratio of the image.
resize.setWidthDescription: Specify the width in pixels and calculate height based on aspect ratio.
resize.setHeightDescription: Specify the height in pixels and calculate width based on aspect ratio.
resize.percentageDescription: Percentage of original size (e.g., 50 for half size, 200 for double size)

toolInfo.title: Resize Image
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to resize JPG, PNG, SVG, or GIF images. You can resize by specifying dimensions in pixels or by percentage, with options to maintain the original aspect ratio.

compress.title: Compress Image
compress.description: Reduce image file size while maintaining quality.
compress.shortDescription: Compress images to reduce file size while maintaining reasonable quality.

crop.title: Crop Image
crop.description: Crop images to remove unwanted areas.

changeColors.title: Change colors in image
changeColors.shortDescription: Quickly swap colors in a image

changeOpacity.title: Change image Opacity
changeOpacity.description: Easily adjust the transparency of your images. Simply upload your image, use the slider to set the desired opacity level between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque), and download the modified image.

convertToJpg.title: Convert Images to JPG
convertToJpg.description: Convert various image formats (PNG, GIF, TIF, PSD, SVG, WEBP, HEIC, RAW) to JPG with customizable quality and background color settings.
convertToJpg.shortDescription: Convert images to JPG with quality control

editor.title: Image Editor
editor.description: Advanced image editor with tools for cropping, rotating, annotating, adjusting colors, and adding watermarks. Edit your images with professional-grade tools directly in your browser.
editor.shortDescription: Edit images with advanced tools and features

imageToText.title: Image to Text (OCR)
imageToText.description: Extract text from images (JPG, PNG) using optical character recognition (OCR).
imageToText.shortDescription: Extract text from images using OCR.

qrCode.title: QR Code Generator
qrCode.description: Generate QR codes for different data types: URL, Text, Email, Phone, SMS, WiFi, vCard, and more.
qrCode.shortDescription: Create customized QR codes for various data formats.

rotate.title: Rotate Image
rotate.description: Rotate an image by a specified angle.

compressPng.title: Compress png
compressPng.description: This is a program that compresses PNG pictures. As soon as you paste your PNG picture in the input area, the program will compress it and show the result in the output area. In the options, you can adjust the compression level, as well as find the old and new picture file sizes.

convertJgpToPng.title: Convert JPG to PNG
convertJgpToPng.description: Quickly convert your JPG images to PNG. Just import your PNG image in the editor on the left
convertJgpToPng.shortDescription: Quickly convert your JPG images to PNG
